actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a tax credit for investment in multipurpose agricultural structures or other buildings designed primarily for grain storage.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an investment tax credit for multipurpose agricultural structures or other buildings designed primarily for grain storage.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a tax credit for investment in multipurpose agricultural structures or other buildings designed primarily for grain storage.
